links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3, -3, 1).
formula: a(n)=a(n-1)+3*(6*n-1)  (with a(0)=1) [From Vincenzo Librandi, Nov 20 2010]a(0)=1, a(1)=16, a(2)=49, a(n)=3*a(n-1)-3*a(n-2)+a(n-3). - _Harvey P. Dale_, Mar 03 2013
prog: (Maxima) A016778(n):=(3*n+1)^2$makelist(A016778(n),n,0,20); /* _Martin Ettl_, Nov 12 2012 */(PARI) a(n)=(3*n+1)^2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 07 2015
